name: Medusa Cult Crusader
description:
The Judgement Day is coming! Give each Believer a Relic from his own faith to make them ascend to their respective Holy Realm.
Matching a Believer with his respective Relic scores 1 point, a wrong match loses 1 point. See how many points can you score in the time limit. The time limit is 1:30 minutes.

Press ASWD to move, Mouse to aim, Left-click to shot,
Mouse wheel to Scroll between Relics.

This game was made at Mad Game Jam Oporto 2020 in under 48 hours. The theme was Mythology and we decided to make our game implement that in our character creation, therefore we made Medusa, a Classical Greek lady, an Ancient Egyptian, a Viking and a Medieval Monk.
